Broadlist Years Lists

2023 Canada Reads

In the Canada Reads list selected 15 books.

Broadlist has categorized these selections as:

  • Verylonglist (15 books)
  • Longlist (15 books)
  • Shortlist (5 books)
  • Winners (1 books)

Read more about how Broadlist categorizes lists.
